sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnonlinepollmanage ( POLL_ID /* */ , POLL_NM /* */ , POLL_BGNDE /* */ , POLL_ENDDE /* */ , POLL_KND /* */ , POLL_DSUSE_ENNC /* */ , POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #pollId# /* */ , #pollNm# /* */ , #pollBgnde# /* */ , #pollEndde# /* */ , #pollKnd# /* */ , #pollDsuseEnnc# /* */ , #pollAtmcDsuseEnnc# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnonlinepollmanage SET POLL_ID=#pollId# /* */ , POLL_NM=#pollNm# /* */ , POLL_BGNDE=#pollBgnde# /* */ , POLL_ENDDE=#pollEndde# /* */ , POLL_KND=#pollKnd# /* */ , POLL_DSUSE_ENNC=#pollDsuseEnnc# /* */ , POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC=#pollAtmcDsuseEnnc# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE POLL_ID=#pollId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT POLL_ID /* */ , POLL_NM /* */ , POLL_BGNDE /* */ , POLL_ENDDE /* */ , POLL_KND /* */ , POLL_DSUSE_ENNC /* */ , POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnonlinepollmanage WHERE POLL_ID=#pollId# /* */

SELECT POLL_ID /* */ , POLL_NM /* */ , POLL_BGNDE /* */ , POLL_ENDDE /* */ , POLL_KND /* */ , POLL_DSUSE_ENNC /* */ , POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnonlinepollmanage WHERE 1=1
POLL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
POLL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY POLL_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnonlinepollmanage WHERE 1=1
POLL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
POLL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
